title: Joint Statement by the President of France Emmanuel Macron, Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel, Prime Minister of the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland Boris Johnson, and President of the United States Joseph R. Biden, Jr. on Iran
content:
1. Joint Statement by the President of France Emmanuel Macron, Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel, Prime Minister of the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland Boris Johnson, and President of the United States Joseph R. Biden, Jr. on Iran  The White House
  2. US is deeply skeptical and considering taking tougher action as Iran says it will return to nuclear talks  CNN
  3. COVID-19, corporate taxes, Iran nuclear deal on Biden's agenda for Day 1 of G-20 summit  USA TODAY
  4. Biden, European Allies Call on Iran to Change Course on Nuclear Program  The Wall Street Journal
  5. Biden and European leaders say they're 'convinced' Iran deal can be quickly restored  CNN
contentSnippet:
Joint Statement by the President of France Emmanuel Macron, Chancellor of Germany Angela Merkel, Prime Minister of the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland Boris Johnson, and President of the United States Joseph R. Biden, Jr. on Iran  The White House
US is deeply skeptical and considering taking tougher action as Iran says it will return to nuclear talks  CNN
COVID-19, corporate taxes, Iran nuclear deal on Biden's agenda for Day 1 of G-20 summit  USA TODAY
Biden, European Allies Call on Iran to Change Course on Nuclear Program  The Wall Street Journal
Biden and European leaders say they're 'convinced' Iran deal can be quickly restored  CNN

localize.title: イランに関するフランスのエマニュエル・マクロン大統領、ドイツのアンゲラ・メルケル首相、英国・北アイルランドのボリス・ジョンソン首相、米国のジョセフ・R・バイデン・Jr.大統領の共同声明について
法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙、德国总理安格拉-默克尔、英国首相鲍里斯-约翰逊和美国总统小约瑟夫-拜登关于伊朗的联合声明
法國總統埃馬紐埃爾-馬克龍、德國總理安格拉-默克爾、英國首相鮑里斯-約翰遜和美國總統小約瑟夫-拜登關於伊朗的聯合聲明
